report.desc: Reports will be reviewed by the Mod team. If approved, reported comments will be deleted.
report.label: Report
report.title: Report comment

unsavedLeaveDialog.desc: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave this page?
unsavedLeaveDialog.title: Whoa, careful!

howWork.desc: When you refer someone to Cocrea.world using your unique referral link, they’ll receive 1 Nequagem as soon as they create a qualifying project. And you’ll also receive 1 Nequagem with Cocrea.
howWork.step1Content: Tell your friends about Cocrea. Copy and send your referral link to them. Or simply games, stories or projects you like with them.
howWork.step2Content: You can track when they signup, start creating a project, publish their first game, and more.
howWork.step3Content: Earn Naguagems when they create a qualifying project.
howWork.title: How does it work?

link.desc: Copy and share your referral link with friends.
link.subtitle: Invite someone that can create games, animation, interactive stories and earn Naquagems when they create a qualifying project.
link.title: Earn Naquagems for every new creator you refer

share.othersProjectDesc: Check out these projects, choose one, and share it with your friends.
share.ownProjectDesc: Of course, your project also counts!
share.question: Q: Does it count for a creator who signs up with the game link I share?

cocrea.desc: Build My Scratch Space with Simple and Flexible Customization
cocrea.title: Welcome to Cocrea

gandi.desc: Code, Design, and Create Games Together
gandi.title: Hey, this is Gandi IDE
